report.title: Locations list excluding sensitive records
report.description: A list of locations, excluding sensitive locations defined by a boolean custom attribute.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms lt on lt.id=l.location_type_id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: sensattr
param.description: Boolean location attribute used to filter for sensitivity of the site.
param.join: LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values sens on sens.location_id=l.id and sens.location_attribute_id=#sensattr# and sens.deleted=false

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of location IDs to load
